name: Fabric, Needlework, Piece Goods, and Sewing Stores
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell fabric, patterns, yarn, and other needlework/
sewing supplies such as thread, buttons, snaps, lining, trim and lace,
scissors, and zippers. Such merchants may also offer sewing classes
or instruction.
For merchants that primarily provide sewing or knitting instruction,
use MCC 8299.
